      • getInventory

        public Inventory getInventory(boolean update)
        Returns an inventory which contains all the items of the components and panes. The final result which can be displayed to a player.
        Specified by:
        getInventory in interface CustomInventory
        Parameters:
        update - Whether or not to re-create the inventory or to return a pre-existing one

      • saveInventory

        public void saveInventory(Inventory inv)
        Saves the items to the StoragePane objects in the components. Calling this is required to prevent item loss .
        Specified by:
        saveInventory in interface CustomInventory
        Parameters:
        inv - The inventory that contains the items to be saved to storage panes
